sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
To use this action, your system administrator must have configured a Connection Alias to your target ServiceNow instance.

This action use remote incident number to retrieve display values of following fields in remote instance:
  • Short Description
  • Description
  • State
  • Caller
  • Business Service
  • Category
  • SubCategory
  • Impact
  • Urgency
  • Configuration Item
  • Assignment Group
  • Assigned To
  • Contact Type
  • Correlation ID

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Lookup Remote Incident (XML)
